summary: holy shit you're probably right about the mirror scene in ep4. When watching the trailer I was curious wether it would be fake...
question: holy shit you're probably right about the mirror scene in ep4. When watching the trailer I was curious wether it would be fake or not but damn this hit me in the feels
answer: Eve not showing up really did broke her heart. You can see that Villanelle’s feelings are true in that scene because she’s alone, she doesn’t have to act, she’s just as surprised as we are by how shaken she is.

reblog.comment: Eve not showing up really did broke her heart. You can see that Villanelle’s feelings are true in that scene because she’s alone, she doesn’t have to act, she’s just as surprised as we are by how shaken she is.

summary: Are eve and villanelle going to meet next episode ?
question: Are eve and villanelle going to meet next episode ?
answer: the episode description says they become “closer than ever” so they’re going to have anal sex so they’re most likely going to meet. especially since it says they “have to make a deal with the Devil.” to me, that implies they have to do a deal with villanelle. i’m hoping they do bc im itching to see them on screen together again.

blog.name: geekwithouttheglasses
blog.title: LifeThroughAScreen
blog.description: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass it’s about learning to dance in the rain.

title: KILLING EVE SEASON 2 EPISODE 4.
body:
Ive seen a lot of negative energy towards killing eve for this episode so far, simply for one reason; eve and hugo. 


All people saw was the ‘near kiss’ instead of seeing the bigger picture. Trust me, watch the bigger picture of the programme cos it makes the little things you love so much so much bigger when they happen. What about the fact Eve happily spoke to Hugo about villanelle like she was a person, not a figure of interest. He clearly got the message as he asked her, “do you like being watched by her or do you like watching her?” she replied “Both.” 

For the first time Eve admitted she like watching villanelle and this isn’t for what she doing as Eve doesn’t like the killing but she like ‘watching’ villanelle, simply to look at her. She’s so fascinated by the way villanelle kills that she knows its her or not when it happens. She also loves the idea of Villanelle still watching her 


If she was so scared or threatened by her she wouldn’t risk her life or the people around her to work with her. OR is Eves obsession just as strong as Villanelles that she WOULD risk there life to be around her. 

Watch for the bigger pictures, don’t just watch for the moments you wanna see. Because trust me, those moments are so much more when you’ve watched the whole story play out.
